episodes.description:

Known for his extravagant lifestyle, designer suits, and luxury cars, Tobi’s SPAC Nation church was a front for manipulation and financial exploitation, targeting young people desperate for hope.

This video uncovers the shocking details of Tobi’s schemes, the heartbreaking stories of his victims, and the long-overdue justice being served. How did a man with so many allegations against him operate unchecked for so long? And why are authorities only acting now?

As an atheist, I’m here to break down how figures like Tobi use religion as a tool for personal gain, leaving devastation in their wake. Join me as I expose the truth behind Tobi the cult leader and discuss why his deportation is just the beginning of holding exploitative preachers accountable.

Justice is finally catching up with him—let’s talk about it!
#PastorTobi #SPACNation #ReligiousScams #CultLeaderExposed #TobiAdegboyega #JusticeForVictims #ScamExposed #ReligionAndExploitation #Deportation #AccountabilityNow #ExposingScammers #CultWatch #StopReligiousAbuse #AtheistPerspective #CallOutTheScam #justicematters

episodes.title: Is Jerry Eze a Cult Leader?
Debunking Jerry Eze’s 'Miracle' at London Conference: The Truth Behind the Cerebral Palsy Claim
episodes.description:
Welcome to today's livestream where we critically examine the recent claims made by Jerry Eze at his London conference. In an event that has captured significant attention, Eze has asserted that he healed a child with cerebral palsy, allowing her to walk. However, a closer look at this so-called 'miracle' reveals a disheartening and, frankly, disgusting reality. While the child may have been able to walk, she has not been cured of cerebral palsy.

As an atheist committed to truth and rationality, we find it essential to challenge these narratives that exploit vulnerable individuals and perpetuate false hope. We'll dissect the claims, scrutinise the evidence, and discuss the ethical implications of such assertions. Join us as we seek to uncover the truth behind Jerry Eze’s controversial statement and advocate for genuine, science-based understanding and support for those living with cerebral palsy.

episodes.title: Africa’s Deadliest Christian Cult- over 400 dead including kids. @Paul Mackenzie
episodes.description:
Join me for this one, exposing the evil in the religion of Christianity. This is Kenya’s doomsday cult where victims have crossed the 400 mark as detectives exhumed 12 more bodies on believed to be followers of a pastor who ordered them to fast to death in order to meet Jesus. Apparently the number of those who died has risen to 403, with 95 people rescued.
Paul Mackenzie has been charged with murder after the bodies were found buried in shallow graves in the remote forest of Shakahola in the east of the country.
Survivors and victims' families have said Paul Mackenzie urged followers to fast in order to "go see Jesus".
He and 29 others pleaded not guilty in a court in the coastal town of Malindi.
Mackenzie has already been charged with committing acts of terror, child cruelty and torture, which he denied.
